Item.Value: \f[5|Uther]Five months after the Etrurian border conflict,\w[5] it is still the only thing on the lips of the commons. Talks of Uther's| valor and of his ruthlessness are in equal popularity,\w[4] though the lord himself wishes they would speak of anything else.| Anything at all.|\f[5|nil]\scroll
Thusly,\w[5] when a rider from Tania brings word of a new threat,|
Uther leaps at the chance to put spur to flank and be rid of his home once more.|

\f[2|Uther]After the liberation of Jennifer,\w[5] Uther's team discover a cache of incriminating documents in Beck's makeshift study.| These papers suggest a possible conspiracy,\w[7] a network of criminal outfits who control the ebb and flow of the Lycian| market by suppressing competition and increasing demand.|\f[2|nil]\scroll
To confirm these suspicions,\w[5] Uther brings the documents to his father,|
who then sets his spies to work chasing the ghostly trail of these expert con artists.|
When a lead turns up in Sundale,\w[6] Uther is soon on his steed,\w[5] eager to put the stink of Ostia behind him again.|
Corruption had rooted deep in Lycia,\w[6] with its tendrils choking the life from great cities and humble baileys alike.|
Not so deep that it could not be cut out, however,\w[8] and cut it out Uther did,| and cauterized it with fire for good measure.|
The campaign took weeks,\w[6] for the criminals would fade away like mist and spring forth again in places he had already cleansed;|\w[5] but Uther was not a man known for giving up easily.|
Through bloodshed and bribery he found each villain in turn and in turn he gave them their just dues.|\scroll
\f[2|Uther]It soon became clear that the scope of this treachery was far greater than anyone had anticipated.|
After touching base with their foreign contacts,\f[5|Eiry]\w[7] Uther and his allies find evidence| of operations all across the dark continent.|\f[5|nil]
Acting quickly,\f[5|Leonard]\w[6] Uther and Leonard draw up a plan to strike at all of the Ring's major power bases at once...|
